00039                 Sequence diagrams are simple and easy to understand.
00040                 However, keeping them up-to-date during the development

00042             </p>
00043             <p>
00044                 To make this process easier, I've developed an automatic
00045                 diagram generator that receives XML as input and ouputs
00046                 an HTML page with the diagram.
00047             </p>

00049                 While still not fully working on Internet Explorer, the generator
00050                 already makes life easier for those responsible in maintaining
00051                 this kind of diagrams. We welcome anyone with the patience

00058                 free to do so. Just send an e-mail to thiago.henrique.mata@gmail.com
00059             </p>

00062                 It should give you a view of how the generator works and also entertain you

00064                 diagrams of your own.
